meanings.sent1: The two teams were on par in terms of skill level.

meanings.definition: The average score on a golf hole
meanings.sent1: He managed to score par on the difficult hole.
meanings.sent2: The golfer's goal was to achieve par on every course.
meanings.sent3: Scoring par felt like a victory for the beginner golfer.

meanings.definition: To hit a golf ball in the number of strokes considered standard
meanings.sent1: She aimed to par the hole with precision.
meanings.sent2: Players strive to par each round for a good score.
meanings.sent3: Attempting to par the hole in one shot seemed impossible.

meanings.sent5: Par the ball smoothly to avoid obstacles on the course.
